SEARCH
Package main.models

Class HDBOfficer

java.lang.Object
main.models.User
main.models.Applicant
main.models.HDBOfficer
public class HDBOfficer extends Applicant
Represents a HDB Officer in the BTO system. An officer can handle one approved project and also apply like an applicant.
